name: piral-inspector
description: A DevTools extension for Piral instances and their pilets.
author: smapiot

scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:opera && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:edge
scripts.watch:firefox: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel firefox" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/firefox -t firefox-desktop"
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:parcel firefox && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/firefox -a web-ext-artifacts/firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel chrome" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/chrome -t chromium"
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:parcel chrome && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/chrome -a web-ext-artifacts/chrome
scripts.watch:opera: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel opera" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/opera -t chromium"
scripts.build:opera: npm run build:parcel opera && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/opera -a web-ext-artifacts/opera
scripts.watch:edge: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel edge" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/edge -t chromium"
scripts.build:edge: npm run build:parcel edge && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/edge -a web-ext-artifacts/edge
